name: Shine Analytics Ltd.
description: Developer of an AI-based enterprise legal management platform designed to offer capabilities for matter management and e-billing reporting and analytics. The company's software leverages powerful language analysis technologies to analyze incoming legal invoices, uncover opportunities for reductions or alternative fee arrangements and give visibility on legal spending across the organization, enabling clients to manage and control outside counsel costs and centralize the invoice review for routing all the documents submitted to the correct approver.
